text: Encyclopædia Britannica Ultimate Reference Suite is a series of encyclopaedias that come on DVD, to be installed on computers. ==Linux support== There is no official release of Britannica for Linux, however, there is a way that can help experienced users run Encyclopædia Britannica 2004 Ultimate Reference Suite DVD on Linux. == References == ==Other websites== *Official Britannica website *Review at toptenreviews.com *Review at expertreviews.co.uk *Review at itreviews.co.uk Category:Encyclopædia Britannica
title: Encyclopædia Britannica Ultimate Reference Suite
